name: Legate Cassian Varro
role: Public-face Legate; covert Thalmor puppet master for Whiterun Hold

aspects.high_concept: Charming Imperial Legate with a Smile That Tilts the Room
aspects.trouble: The Thalmor Hold My Commission — and My Secrets
other_aspects: War Is Best Won Before It Is Fought
Every Ally Is Also a Lever
Cipher in My Boot, Dagger in My Words

stunts: Public Face: +2 to Rapport when making a first impression in an official capacity; observers must succeed at Fair (+2) Empathy to sense any deception.
Cipher Fragment: Once per session, Varro can plant a coded message on a scene aspect; players who examine it with Lore Fair (+2) unlock discovery of the hidden quest 'The Hand Behind the Banner'.
Thalmor Backing: +2 to Resources when acquiring Imperial military support, as long as his Thalmor link remains secret.

thalmor_integration.discovery_trigger: Players examine the cipher fragment or roll Notice/Empathy vs Great (+4) during Stage 0 intro

gm_notes: Varro appears publicly as a competent, likeable Imperial officer — the kind of man who makes a room relax. His actual agenda is to ensure the siege is long, costly, and morally injurious to both sides, per Thalmor doctrine. He is not a villain who announces himself; players must be suspicious first.
